General.Name: Pelayaran Nelly Dwi Putri Tbk
General.Description: PT Pelayaran Nelly Dwi Putri Tbk provides shipping services in Indonesia. The operates through three segments: Vessel Charter Services, Ship Repair and Construction Services, and Other Services. The company offers vessel charter services; and builds, repairs, and maintains tugboats and barges. It also transports timber, coal, nickel, stone, sand, and others, as well as provides shipping consulting services. The company was founded in 1977 and is based in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Pelayaran Nelly Dwi Putri Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Haskojaya Abadi.
General.Address: Jalan Majapahit No. 28 A (Dalam), Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10160
